character.name: Rika
character.desc: Rika is very trigger happy and doesn't have the most patiance, so they'll be using their card effects once they're drawn.

RikaFlux.name: Shield Flow
RikaFlux.desc: Gain <c=keyword>{0}</c> <c=status>shield</c> when you attack. <c=downside>Lose this at the end of your turn.</c>

SpicyBoost.name: SPICY BOOST
SpicyBoost.desc: When you lose hull, gain <c=status>BOOST</c> equal to the amount of hull you lost.

CardRotate.name: CARD ROTATE
CardRotate.desc: At the start of your turn, discard 2 cards then draw 2 cards.

RandomUSB.name: SKETCHY USB
RandomUSB.alphadesc: A random USB that will add a non-temp <c=card>Safety Override</c> & gives you the oppurtunity to add one of 5 <c=f00707>Rika</c> cards to your deck.
RandomUSB.desc: A random USB that will add a non-temp <c=card>Safety Override</c> & gives you the oppurtunity to add one of 5 <c=db9b79>Rika</c> cards to your deck.

SpareStatus.name: SPARE STATUS
SpareStatus.desc: At the start of each turn, gain 1 random positive or neutral <c=status>status</c> condition.

MoralBoost.name: MAGIC RAINBOW CARDSLEEVES
MoralBoost.desc: Gain 1 <c=status>BOOST</c> at the start of each of your turns.

BoostedDeck.name: BOOSTED DECK
BoostedDeck.desc: Gain 1 <c=status>BOOST</c> whenever you shuffle your deck.
